title: Hox’s Castle
description: Plane 10’s most deadly game show. Spin the wheel to see if you can survive the Garden of Pain, the Lightning Round, Sudden Death, or the Chamber of Cuddles!
quote: Hopefully, tonight’s contestants will be a lot more robust and a lot less chewy.
altHero: Hox the host, a blue demon
alt2: Barney Guttman falling down a big flight of stairs and getting struck by lightning
alt3: little demons clapping in the audience
tags: game shows with a bit of danger!
